name: Shadow Of Sorrow
description:
A girl's mother has passed away. The only thing left of her mother is a mysterious note left on her deathbed. After visiting her mother's grave late at night, the young protagonist is forced to face her sorrow... if she can.

Controls

  • Move left and right with A/D or the Left/Right arrow Keys
  • Jump with Spacebar
  • Double-tap Spacebar to double jump

Pickups

  • Blue/Red Orb: Increases your speed and distance from the monster
  • Batteries: Increase the health of your flashlight battery
